item.title: How We Grew Traffic to 16,000 in 4.5 months on $52/month (and every tool we use)
item.description:
How We Grew Traffic to 16,000 in 4.5 months on $52/month (and every tool we use)

Benji and I have only met once. But in 4 months, we've taken a brand new domain and blank WordPress install, and managed to do the following. Get over 16,000 unique visitors in the last 30 days Got kudos on content from the likes of Sean Ellis... Rand Fishkin...

item.title: How To Build An Email List That Can Bring Incredible Results: 11 Bloggers Tell All
item.description:
How To Build An Email List That Can Bring Incredible Results: 11 Bloggers Tell All

You already know that the best tactic to build your business and generate leads is to build an engaged email list. That much is clear. But the question is... How do you build an engaged email list that can grow your business?

item.title: Nudgr - Machine Learning to Increase Conversions
item.description:
Nudgr - Machine Learning to Increase Conversions

How It Works Nudgr is installed onto your website with just two pieces of JavaScript, within the page or through a Tag Manager. Patterns in your customer behaviour are detected, creating unique triggers. Nudges are triggered when someone is about to abandon, rescuing revenue and conversions.

item.title: SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.
item.description:
SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.

Apr 19th, 2016 by Niklas Goeke Don't things like these make you want to punch something? If it were that easy to get 1,000 subscribers, wouldn't we all be internet millionaires by now? We've all seen these before. Outlandish claims like this are based on either one of two assumptions: You're an email marketing expert You have a massive, pre-existing audience.

item.title: How I Got Press Coverage For My Startup With Actual Tips From Reporters
item.description:
How I Got Press Coverage For My Startup With Actual Tips From Reporters

A while back I ran a startup called Daily Pulse. Daily Pulse is a simple way for managers to keep track of their team's progress and receive anonymous feedback without having to bother their team members. It wasn't nearly as successful as it could have been, but I learned a lot from it.

item.title: A 360° View of User Retention (ft. Appcues, Amplitude and Customer.io)
item.description:
A 360° View of User Retention (ft. Appcues, Amplitude and Customer.io)

Today we're going to look at user retention strategies across product, analytics and email-three tools that you can use together to keep users coming back for more. We'll hear from 3 retention experts: First is Jackson Noel.

item.title: 51 best online marketing resources and automation tools to boost your productivity
item.description:

Internet marketing success depends on its perfect execution! Your planning must have an execution which will be- So how do you do it? A battle is not won buy brawls but brains instead!

item.title: Collection of pitch decks from venture capital funded startups
item.description:
Collection of pitch decks from venture capital funded startups

You need to raise some money for your awesome startup, only you need a pesky pitch deck to show venture capitalists (VC) and you don't know what one looks like? It's not all that easy to get access to pitch decks, so I have done the work for you.
